article:
This is my _ . How do you like it? I like it very much. It's always tidy. You can see a map of China and _ pictures on the walls. My classmates and I draw the pictures. We have a soccer in _ classroom, but you can't see it. It's under the _ desk.
Our teachers are always very _ . They do many things every day. We have our lessons _ 8:00 in the morning to 4:00 in the afternoon. After that , we like playing games. Soccer is my favorite. My classmates like to play _ with me because I can play it very well. Then in the evening, we have two more classes. I like to be with my classmates. I have a good time with them every day. _ about you? Do you like your classroom?
